events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorised under the Software Engineering department to ensure that the appropriate technical team reviews your profile.
A recruiter from our engineering division has been assigned to your application and will be in touch shortly to coordinate the next steps.
Your initial screening for the software engineer role went well. We are impressed with your background and would like to proceed further.
The candidate responded quickly and positively to confirm availability for the upcoming technical interview.
A technical interview with the senior software engineering panel has been scheduled for next Wednesday at 10 AM.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating solid coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and other employment details with the candidate.
The HR interview was completed successfully. The candidate expressed enthusiasm about joining the company and was aligned with our core values.
We have extended a formal offer to the candidate for the software engineering position, including salary and benefits details.
The candidate has provided positive feedback regarding the offer and has expressed strong interest in accepting the position.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer to join our engineering team as a software developer.
The new software engineer has started onboarding, including orientation sessions and initial setup with development tools.
The recruitment process is now closed successfully with the candidate integrated into the engineering department.
